Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
The Player is the main character of the Game.

    • getWorkerByPosition

      public Worker getWorkerByPosition​(Position position)
      Returns the worker given his position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position where the worker should be returned.
      Returns:
      Returns the worker given his position. null is returned if no worker is found.

    • addWorker

      public void addWorker​(Worker worker)
      Adds the given worker to the Player.
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker to be added.

    • initWorkers

      public void initWorkers​(java.util.List<Position> positions)
      Sets the workers at the given positions. This method should be called only on game start. The positions list argument must be of the same size of the player workers.
      Parameters:
      positions - a list of positions.
